application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Threshold Network Learning in the Presence of Equivalences

affiliation.orgName: Royal Holloway and Bedford New College University of London Egham

analytic.title: Threshold Network Learning in the Presence of Equivalences

abstract.p: This paper applies the theory of Probably Approximately Correct (PAC) learning to multiple output feedforward threshold networks in which the weights conform to certain equivalences. It is shown that the sample size for reliable learning can be bounded above by a formula similar to that required for single output networks with no equivalences. The best previously obtained bounds are improved for all cases.
